column2: BRIEF-Warrior Met Coal Says Co Borrowed $70.0 Mln Under Abl Facility As A Precautionary Measure Due To Uncertainty From Covid-19 March 27 (Reuters) - Warrior Met Coal Inc: * WARRIOR MET COAL - BORROWED $70.0 MILLION UNDER ABL FACILITY AS A PRECAUTIONARY MEASURE TO INCREASE CO'S CASH POSITION DUE TO UNCERTAINTY FROM COVID-19 Source : (bit.ly/2xuuXqu) Further company coverage:
